mapper.sql: a.accountid, a.claimid, a.policyid, a.money, a.userid, a.user_card, a.banc_card, a.accountant, a.transfertime, a.account_status, a.remarks, a.yuliu, c.claimid, c.claim_name, c.claim_card, c.claim_phone, c.reason, c.policuid, c.claim_date, c.coverageid, c.pol_property, c.site_photo, c.third_pic, c.initial_amount, c.final_amount, c.upper_operator, c.upper_opinion, c.upper_date, c.scout, c.first_auditor, c.second_auditor, c.third_auditor, c.accountant, c.final_date, c.del_status, c.userid, c.transfer_failed, c.yuliu1, c.yuliu2, c.statusid
mapper.select: select count(0) from account a,claim_list c where a.claimid=c.claimid
